title: The Notorious Jair Bolsonaro of Brazil
description:
Brazil heads to the polls Sunday to elect a new president. The frontrunner is Jair Bolsonaro. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Sao Paulo bureau chief Julia Leite on how this controversial candidate became such a heavy favorite. 
FOLLOW UP
 Julia's latest report: Brazil's Best Currency Forecasters Say Rally Will Reverse
You can follow Julia at: @julialeite 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
